short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage contacting pages and people

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage contacting pages and people with customised formulated messages, phrases and emojis. You can also make the messages personal with names! Just compose your messages, gather a list of friends you want to message set the timers and start!
